Blog.post: Sorry I haven't updated in a while now. I've been kinda busy. I haven't got too much to say, excep my sister was in a School "Wizard of Oz" play. It wasn't a crappy Primary school one, it was a really good High School one. Dorothy was a Grade 11 student, The Lion, Tin Man and Scarecrow were Grade 12, the munchkins and Jitterbugs were all Grade 8 (with some exceptions), my sis is Grade 8. Dorothy *drools over dorothy* =I It was Kate's Birthday on the 29th f may (Yes, 4 days after mine) so I was going to go to the movies with her, Lukas and Rowan, but she couldn't come so I went to see Troy with Lukas,Sis and Rowan instead Anyone who doesn't have a blog, get one now. urlLink Here See Ya then

Yaaaa!!! VBB Is uploaded now. http://i.domaindlx.com/vortexbb/vortexbb%20compressed I stuffed up the domian but I'll fix it up when I upload new files. Also, thought i might tell you that I'm now available on MSN Messneger: monkey_boy_213@hotmail.com C Ya
A recently bought 2 new beyblades. They are - Hasbro Wolborg 4 - Hasbro Dranzer Gigus @_@ So cooool
Well, the truth is that i'm not taking a break from blading because my blade swere picked up by a cleaner lady....YAAAAY! How cool is that? Well, must go now...

Man...I really am the dumbest person in the whole world. I went to see 'The Day After Tomorrow' at the movies (very good, has to be seen on large screen!), but I decided to take the following with me for no reason: - Customise Grip w/ rubber thing + G-Winder - Gaia Dragoon MS So guess what? (a) I lost it... (b) I lost it because I had piss! (c) I lost it becuase I'm a god damn idiot! Correct answer ...(C)! So, i am having thoughts about taking a break from blading, my desision isn't final, so I'll keep you posted...BTW, if i do...it wont be for long, just until i decide what to do next. Untill my next post...toodles
Just added these to my Beyblade collection. - Zinari 2 - Salamalyon 2 - Driger MS (Chinese Mold)

I must say, that whilst Wolborg MS is now officially my favorite beyblade, I am dissapointed. The tip already has small cracks in it. I'm trying to get the New LimtedBlack Version, hopefully it's more durable.

OMG! =D It-Its r-r-r-realy HERE! OMG Beyblades have arrived so I'm really reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally reallyreally really...pleased and i'm soooooo happy. Once i get VBB uploded I'll post some info on my new blades. Toodles!

I made a new site called 'Brain Chipping', I want everyone to go there. urlLink Via this link . I also recently bought a new book on HTML, and I will try and get on on C++ Pogramming soon. Once i finish the HTML one. I'm trying to think of a subject to writ on...in HTML. Then I can, publish it. You see...I alredy knew some basic html, however, I wanted to find out some of the more advanced stuff too. Must go now...c-ya'll --Phil--
